message: Starting review of Phase 2 Implementation - checking task status and deliverables
Examining actual code deliverables - checking agents.py and phases.py implementation
Verifying SQL error reported - checking state_db.py get_agents_for_task function
Testing dashboard API endpoints to verify implementation works
Found critical issue - SQL error due to missing created_at column in agents table

Review completed - Phase 2 REJECTED due to critical SQL error preventing dashboard from working. The 'created_at' column referenced in queries doesn't exist in agents table schema. Dashboard returns 500 error instead of showing agent data.
